segments.text: Come on in.Let me show you the house.Isn ' t it something ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Spacious , bright and clean.And the walls were newly painted .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Have you ever seen such a nice house ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: This is the kitchen.Every - thing's new .
segments.speaker: S1
